get.summary: Read all datasets for a given user
get.description: Read all datasets for a given user.

401.description: Unauthorized Error, if basic authentication has failed

post.summary: Creates a dataset for a given user

401.description: Unauthorized Error, if basic authentication has failed

get.summary: Reads a dataset for a given user
get.description: Provides information about a desired dataset.

401.description: Unauthorized Error, if basic authentication has failed

404.description: Not Found Error, if dataset is non-existent

put.description:
Updates status of a dataset with provided ID.
Returns 0 if the requested dataset does not exist.

401.description: Unauthorized Error, if basic authentication has failed

delete.summary: Deletes a dataset for a given user
delete.description: Deletes a given dataset recursively, if it exists.

401.description: Unauthorized Error, if basic authentication has failed

500.description: Internal Server Error, if the delete action failed

post.summary: Uploads a number of emails of a category into a selected dataset which is within the users bucket
post.description:
Uploads a list of emails to a users MinIO bucket and creates references in the database regarding the dataset and corresponding category.
Please note, that the category name is case-sensitive.

400.description: Unauthorized Error, if one of the email files is not a .eml-file or no emails are provided

401.description: Unauthorized Error, if basic authentication has failed

404.description: Not Found Error, if dataset is non-existent

get.summary: Provides for each label within the dataset text content embeddings
get.description: Provides for each label within the dataset text content embeddings.

401.description: Unauthorized Error, if basic authentication has failed

404.description: Not Found Error, if dataset is non-existent

get.summary: Provides a SVG as base64 that represents labels histogram
get.description: Provides a histogram for dataset labels.

401.description: Unauthorized Error, if basic authentication has failed

404.description: Not Found Error, if dataset is non-existent

get.summary: Provides for each label within the dataset sentiment analysis as a histogram
get.description: Provides for each label within the dataset an SVG as a Base64 string which shows sentiments histograms.

401.description: Unauthorized Error, if basic authentication has failed

404.description: Not Found Error, if dataset is non-existent

get.summary: Provides for each label within the dataset a list of the most frequent words
get.description: Returns for each label within the dataset a list of the most frequent words.

401.description: Unauthorized Error, if basic authentication has failed

404.description: Not Found Error, if dataset is non-existent

get.summary: Provides for each label within the dataset a list of the most relevant words
get.description: Returns for each label within the dataset a list of the most relevant words.

401.description: Unauthorized Error, if basic authentication has failed

404.description: Not Found Error, if dataset is non-existent

get.summary: Read all models for a given user
get.description: Read all models for a given user.

401.description: Unauthorized Error, if basic authentication has failed

get.summary: Reads a model for a given user
get.description: Provides information about a desired model. The model ID is equivalent to the MLflow run ID.

401.description: Unauthorized Error, if basic authentication has failed

404.description: Not Found Error, if model is non-existent

delete.summary: Deletes a model for a given user
delete.description:
Deletes a given model, if it exists.
Please note, that MLflow sets the lifecycle stage of the run to "deleted", so the run and
corresponding artifacts will not be permanently deleted and are still available in MinIO.

401.description: Unauthorized Error, if basic authentication has failed

500.description: Internal Server Error, if the delete action failed

get.summary: Get ONNX model for given model id
get.description: Returns for each label within the dataset a list of the most relevant words.

401.description: Unauthorized Error, if basic authentication has failed

404.description: Not Found Error, if RunId is non-existent

get.summary: Provides all model metrics generated as part of the training pipeline, with accuracy always generated
get.description: Provides all generated metrics of a model. At least the accuracy is always generated.

401.description: Unauthorized Error, if basic authentication has failed

404.description: Not Found Error, if model are non-existent

get.summary: Provides a classification report for a given model
get.description: Provides a classification report for given model.

401.description: Unauthorized Error, if basic authentication has failed

404.description: Not Found Error, if model are non-existent

get.summary: Provides a SVG as a Base64 string which shows a confusion matrix
get.description: Provides a SVG as a Base64 string which shows a confusion matrix.

401.description: Unauthorized Error, if basic authentication has failed

404.description: Not Found Error, if model is non-existent

get.summary: Provides for each label a SVG as a Base64 string which shows a calibration curve
get.description:
Provides for each label a SVG as a Base64 string which shows a probability calibration curve.
For more information regarding the generation of calibration curves, see https://scikit-learn.org/stable/auto_examples/calibration/plot_calibration_curve.html

401.description: Unauthorized Error, if basic authentication has failed

404.description: Not Found Error, if model is non-existent

post.description:
Runs a new analytics pipeline with the given ZenML configuration.

:param config: Analysis pipeline configuration
:param user: Authorized user which owns the configured dataset
:return: RunInfo; Information regarding the started MLflow run

email.description: This is an example request of a email dataset pipeline

tracking.run_name: Dataset analysis of last months emails
tracking.description: The idea behind this run is...

401.description: Unauthorized Error, if basic authentication has failed

404.description: Not Found Error, if dataset is non-existent

post.description:
Runs a new training pipeline with the given ZenML configuration.

:param config: Training pipeline configuration
:param user: Authorized user which owns the configured dataset
:return: RunInfo; Information regarding the started MLflow run

automl.description: This is an example request of a model training pipeline with AutoML.

tracking.description: The idea behind this run is...

transformers.description: This is an example request of a model training pipeline with Hugging Face transformers.

tracking.run_name: Run with distilbert-base-german-cased as a Transformer model checkpoint
tracking.description: The idea behind this run is...

401.description: Unauthorized Error, if basic authentication has failed

404.description: Not Found Error, if dataset is non-existent

AnalyticsEmbeddingsResponse.title: AnalyticsEmbeddingsResponse
AnalyticsEmbeddingsResponse.description: Helper model which provides a dict with embeddings for each dataset label

AnalyticsHistogramResponse.title: AnalyticsHistogramResponse
AnalyticsHistogramResponse.description: Helper model which provides a dict with the category name and corresponding emails count

AnalyticsPipelineConfiguration.title: AnalyticsPipelineConfiguration
AnalyticsPipelineConfiguration.description: Configuration of ZenML pipeline and MLflow tracking for analyzing a dataset

AnalyticsPipelineType.title: AnalyticsPipelineType
AnalyticsPipelineType.description:
Types of supported analysis pipelines:

- `email` - Pipeline where a dataset containing emails will be analyzed.

AnalyticsSentimentsResponse.title: AnalyticsSentimentsResponse
AnalyticsSentimentsResponse.description: Helper model which provides a dict with sentiments as a Base64 image for each dataset label

AnalyticsWordsResponse.title: AnalyticsWordsResponse
AnalyticsWordsResponse.description: Helper model which provides a dict with the most frequent/relevant words within a dataset

Base64Image.title: Base64Image
Base64Image.description: Helper model which provides an image as a Base64 string

DatasetStatus.title: DatasetStatus
DatasetStatus.description: Defines different states while dataset creation.

DatasetType.title: DatasetType
DatasetType.description:
Types of supported datasets. Type in this case ultimately only means what kind of files can be found within the dataset.
Currently, only emails (`eml`-files) are considered.

DeletedResponse.title: DeletedResponse
DeletedResponse.description: Helper model which shows how many objects in MinIO where deleted

Email.title: Email
Email.description:
Combination of email ID and content.
The content represents the "entire" email, including the header.

HTTP401Error.title: HTTP401Error
HTTP401Error.description:
HTTP error which represents an unauthorized error.
Raised if user could not be found or authorized.

HTTPDataset404Error.title: HTTPDataset404Error
HTTPDataset404Error.description:
HTTP error which represents a not found error.
Raised if a non-existent dataset is requested.

example.detail: Dataset with ID 'x' does not exists

HTTPDatasetDeletion500Error.title: HTTPDatasetDeletion500Error
HTTPDatasetDeletion500Error.description:
HTTP error which represents an internal server error.
Raised if a delete action of a dataset has failed.

example.detail: Errors occurred while deleting dataset with ID 'x'

HTTPModel404Error.title: HTTPModel404Error
HTTPModel404Error.description:
HTTP error which represents a not found error.
Raised if a non-existent model is requested.

example.detail: Model with ID 'x' does not exists

HTTPModelDeletion500Error.title: HTTPModelDeletion500Error
HTTPModelDeletion500Error.description:
HTTP error which represents an internal server error.
Raised if a delete action of a model has failed.

example.detail: Errors occurred while deleting model with ID 'x'

HTTPNotEML400Error.title: HTTPNotEML400Error
HTTPNotEML400Error.description:
HTTP error which represents a bad request error.
Raised if user not uploads emails as .eml-file

example.detail: Errors occurred while deleting dataset with ID 'x'

MLflowTrackingConfiguration.title: MLflowTrackingConfiguration
MLflowTrackingConfiguration.description: Configuration of experiment in MLflow tracking

ModelCalibrationCurvesResponse.title: ModelCalibrationCurvesResponse
ModelCalibrationCurvesResponse.description: Helper model which provides a dict with calibration curves as a Base64 image for each model label

ModelConfusionMatrixResponse.title: ModelConfusionMatrixResponse
ModelConfusionMatrixResponse.description: Helper model which provides a confusion matrix as a Base64 image

ModelMetricsClassificationReportResponse.title: ModelMetricsClassificationReportResponse
ModelMetricsClassificationReportResponse.description: Helper model which provides a classification report of a trained model

ModelMetricsResponse.title: ModelMetricsResponse
ModelMetricsResponse.description: Helper model which provides all textual metrics of a trained model

ModifiedResponse.title: ModifiedResponse
ModifiedResponse.description: Helper model which shows how many objects in MinIO where modified

TrainingPipelineConfiguration.title: TrainingPipelineConfiguration
TrainingPipelineConfiguration.description: Configuration of ZenML pipeline and MLflow tracking for training a classification model

TrainingPipelineType.title: TrainingPipelineType
TrainingPipelineType.description:
Types of supported training pipelines:

- `automl` - Training pipeline where a [`TPOTClassifier`](https://epistasislab.github.io/tpot/api/#classification) will be fitted.
- `transformer` - Training pipeline where a selected ðŸ¤— Transformer model (e.g. [`distilbert-base-german-cased`](https://huggingface.co/distilbert-base-german-cased)) will be fine-tuned.

UpdateDatasetRequest.title: UpdateDatasetRequest
UpdateDatasetRequest.description: Dataset data which should be updated

UploadedResponse.title: UploadedResponse
UploadedResponse.description: Helper model which shows how many objects in MinIO where uploaded
